title: leveled up to 5, didnt get the free stuff?
body: im suppose to get something right?

replies.body: When you get your chest, don't forget to save your ashe and garen champion shards without perming them. It is astoundingly inefficient to perm them for Ashe who is incredibly cheap in terms of IP cost and Garen who is actually free. Those shards are much better used for champion rerolls.

Sometimes it can take a few minutes for the chest and key to be updated and added to your account. If you're still having an issue with it not showing up, I recommend you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account specialists can help you out.
